ygData.messageBody:
Oh well, that's where the black tome with silver runes comes in ;)

Fetko, 18th level wizard, Mith Marr

(i'm excellent in old erudian, gimmie a tell if you need it and are nearby)

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Skull of Jhen Tra (how to use it **Spoiler**)
